query.sfwSql: SELECT count(*) FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE PRI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE CI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PRI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = CI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE PRI.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND CI.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID AND PRI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC')
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT count(*) FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE PRI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE CI ON PRI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = CI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE PRI.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND CI.PERSON_ID = @PERSON_ID AND PRI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC')

query.sfwSql: SELECT count(*) FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE PRI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE CI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PRI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = CI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE PRI.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND CI.ORG_ID = @ORG_ID AND PRI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC')
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT count(*) FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE PRI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE CI ON PRI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = CI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE PRI.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND CI.ORG_ID = @ORG_ID AND PRI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC')

query.sfwSql: SELECT SBPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, SBP.NAME, SBR.REQUEST_ID, SO.ORG_ID, SO.ORG_NAME, SPR.PERSON_ID, SPR.FIRST_NAME, SPR.LAST_NAME, SBPI.STATUS_VALUE, SBR.SOURCE_VALUE FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SBPI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SBP WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBPI.PROCESS_ID = SBP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_case_instance SBCI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SBPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION SO WITH(NOLOCK) ON SO.ORG_ID = SBCI.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON SPR WITH(NOLOCK) ON SPR.PERSON_ID = SBCI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST SBR WITH(NOLOCK) ON SBR.REQUEST_ID = SBCI.REQUEST_ID order by 1 desc
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SBPI.PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID, SBP.NAME, SBR.REQUEST_ID, SO.ORG_ID, SO.ORG_NAME, SPR.PERSON_ID, SPR.FIRST_NAME, SPR.LAST_NAME, SBPI.STATUS_VALUE, SBR.SOURCE_VALUE FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SBPI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_PROCESS SBP ON SBPI.PROCESS_ID = SBP.PROCESS_ID INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_case_instance SBCI ON SBCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SBPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_ORGANIZATION SO ON SO.ORG_ID = SBCI.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN SGT_PERSON SPR ON SPR.PERSON_ID = SBCI.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN SGW_BPM_REQUEST SBR ON SBR.REQUEST_ID = SBCI.REQUEST_ID order by 1 desc

query.sfwSql: SELECT case_instance_id FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = @PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT case_instance_id FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE WHERE PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID = @PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID

query.sfwSql: SELECT SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE SCI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE SPI.PROCESS_ID = @process_id AND SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND SCI.PERSON_ID = @person_id AND SCI.ORG_ID = @org_id
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE SCI ON SCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE SPI.PROCESS_ID = @process_id AND SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND SCI.PERSON_ID = @person_id AND SCI.ORG_ID = @org_id

query.sfwSql: SELECT SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE SCI WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE SPI.PROCESS_ID = @process_id AND SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND SCI.PERSON_ID = @person_id AND SCI.ORG_ID = @org_id AND SCI.reference_id = @reference_id
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE SPI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE SCI ON SCI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = SPI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE SPI.PROCESS_ID = @process_id AND SPI.STATUS_VALUE = 'INPC' AND SCI.PERSON_ID = @person_id AND SCI.ORG_ID = @org_id AND SCI.reference_id = @reference_id

query.sfwSql: SELECT count(*) FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE PRI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE CI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PRI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = CI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE CI.REFERENCE_ID = @REFERENCE_ID AND PRI.PROCESS_ID IN (SELECT process_id FROM sgw_bpm_process p2 WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE case_id in( SELECT c2.case_id FROM sgw_bpm_case c2 WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN (SELECT case_file FROM sgw_bpm_case c1 WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN sgw_bpm_process p1 WITH(NOLOCK) ON p1.CASE_ID = c1.CASE_ID WHERE p1.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID) details ON details.CASE_FILE = c2.CASE_FILE )) AND PRI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC')
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT count(*) FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE PRI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE CI ON PRI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = CI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE CI.REFERENCE_ID = @REFERENCE_ID AND PRI.PROCESS_ID IN (SELECT process_id FROM sgw_bpm_process p2 WHERE case_id in( SELECT c2.case_id FROM sgw_bpm_case c2 INNER JOIN (SELECT case_file FROM sgw_bpm_case c1 INNER JOIN sgw_bpm_process p1 ON p1.CASE_ID = c1.CASE_ID WHERE p1.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID) details ON details.CASE_FILE = c2.CASE_FILE )) AND PRI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC')

query.sfwSql: SELECT count(*) FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE PRI WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE CI WITH(NOLOCK) ON PRI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = CI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE PRI.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND CI.ORG_ID = @ORG_ID AND CI.REFERENCE_ID = @REFERENCE_ID AND PRI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC')
query.sfwPostgre: SELECT count(*) FROM SGW_BPM_PROCESS_INSTANCE PRI INNER JOIN SGW_BPM_CASE_INSTANCE CI ON PRI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID = CI.CASE_INSTANCE_ID WHERE PRI.PROCESS_ID = @PROCESS_ID AND CI.ORG_ID = @ORG_ID AND CI.REFERENCE_ID = @REFERENCE_ID AND PRI.STATUS_VALUE IN ('INPC', 'UNPC')
